p: Parameter values of h = 0.7, s = 0.84 and λ = 1.23, and h = 0.76, s = 0.53 and λ = 1.13, respectively yield 40 and 100 year cycles. These two cycles are very rare events, so that the relative frequencies of their outbreaks are both as small as about 10 −6 and are shown in the Supplementary Information, in Fig. S4 with larger marker-size.
